title: Rare but very serious Client Issue
body:
I was in queue for a ranked game. Was probably about 9:45pm or so on 8 June.
I then exited the queue to go refresh my water and right at that moment it must have popped, and said "you can't leave, a match is found" or something like that.
I thought ah well I can grab water in loading screen, so I clicked "Accept", and 5/10 player icons showed up, then nothing happened and I was returned to the main screen, with the "play" button available at the top.
I assumed that therefore someone hadn't accepted (only 5/10 showed as accepted, suspicious - only showed my team? enemy team?).
I went to grab a drink of water, thinking all was fine. This was why I was exiting queue in the first place.
I came back to pc and joined queue again, and it said I was already in a game!!! I had NO WARNING of this.
It was up to me with 35s or so to pick a champ, and at that point someone must have quit because it then dropped me back out to start screen.
All very strange. I hope nobody lost league points from that.
I'm a developer, business and game, so I'm not ignorant to how complex the client must be. I think there's a timing interaction issue with the edge case of exiting the queue at the same time it pops (either just before or just after - maybe before the client has been informed the queue has popped but after the "x" is clicked?).
I know this behavior is bad and undesirable for anyone, even if it would be very rare.
I think it's worth fixing, it may be very rare but that is a serious bug.
Thankyou.

replies.body:
If a red reads this, and something is actually done about it because of it, I'll name my first-born "Barf Feet".

Generally bugs go in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
